GSD.description:
habanalabs/gaudi: fix shift out of bounds

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.63 by commit b09e5ab18c9f52ff14cf968770e15d5b2dd85c43. For more details please see the references link.
